title: guy_wonderful
author: guy_wonderful
created_time: January 26, 2023, 10:26:03 PMLast edit: January 27, 2023, 06:05:04 PM by guy_wonderful
content: Link to the general tread is at the signature!Let me remind you that a draw is open, such as a lottery but with special algorithms.Jackpot is at 100 USD. Total prize pool is at 500 USD The draw will take place in three stages. And everyone will win. A guaranteed prize of 1 BUCK on the first draw will be for everyone!The first - is just pulling out a number. Winning a prizes.Second- X2 Secret. Will be known at the end of the first draw. Hint: there is a secret in this post, what is it?Third - Multiplication by earning two referrals. + 25% payout.UNCALLED CAPITAL RATIO (UCR)The first one is the most important. The last number that is drawn: wins the Jackpot!Let's say 20 participants. draw of the number. A participant is randomly selected, and it is randomly determined how much he won. It can be a number from 1 to 8 - equivalent to dollars. The one who came through this random queue receives a prize and is eliminated to wait for the second round.Thus, there will be fewer and fewer participants. Whoever falls last will win $100 It is FREE to be a part of the lottey!Referral bonus: Just pass the information about the lottery to your friends and colleagues.When registering, enter your nickname. Two such invitations and you will receive multiplayer +25% on winnings.Let's say you won 5 dollars in pulling out a number, then you will win 6.25. If you win the jackpot, then the prize will be 125 in place of 100. ATTENTION: This is the minimum amount to win if there is a surplus inafter winning, and there is UCR, then the amount of the surplus will be added to your winnings. This does not apply to the won jackpot. There are currently 4 registrants.If there are 4 participants on the day of the draw, then each will receive $125 in any case^                                                                                                                            ^ So for those participants who are already registered, it is better for others not to register anymore.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Before you post a thread you should at least get it proofread or run a program looking for grammatical errors. You have a ton of spelling errors and look very unprofessional. I'm a little curious how it's free and your sig shows nearly 2$ a share. Are they 2 different things?

comments.author: guy_wonderful
comments.created_time: January 27, 2023, 01:28:16 AMLast edit: January 27, 2023, 07:41:40 AM by guy_wonderful
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on January 27, 2023, 01:18:19 AMBefore you post a thread you should at least get it proofread or run a program looking for grammatical errors. You have a ton of spelling errors and look very unprofessional. I'm a little curious how it's free and your sig shows nearly 2$ a share. Are they 2 different things?actualy I forgot to do that. done.Yes/ exactly it's a two different things. Fund is run with a shareholders money. I pay for expenses of lottery fully by myself.
